Title: ContentFinder
Description: Help user to find the content in every file in your folder.ContentFinder support regex search and asynchronous processing.
HomeWiki:
• Project Description: ﻿

Try to find the content in every file in your folder.

  • Support File Type Now:

xml,txt,xsd,html,pdf,config,cs,csproj,manifest,resx,settings,sln,user,vb,vspscc,vssscc,xaml.
xls,xlsx,ppt,pptx,docx.doc(only support strings),c,cc,cpp,h.

  • Using technology:

C#,Task,Regular expression,WPF,Open Xml.

  • Useful tips
    • The search box support Regular expression.
    •  The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in the filter parameter :
      • *   Zero or more Characters
      • ?   Exactly one character.
    • Double click the item in the searched item , can open the file in notepad.exe.
    • Support multiple search directory , split them by ;

 

  • Contact me: henanlinzhoulcl@163.com
  • Test result form softoxi.com : http://www.softoxi.com/content-finder.html
